1553660.name: Twisted Draw
1553660.description:
In Twisted Draw, the card based strategy game, it’s you versus the Necromancer as you lead troops and cast spells to determine the fate of the world. Fill your deck with damage-dealing spells, melee units, range units and buffs to defeat the onslaught of the undead.

The Gameplay
As a turn-based strategy game, you and the Necromancer will individually gain control of the battlefield and command your units to move and attack as you see fit. You'll also be able to dish out damage to enemy units and buff your own troops with any instant cards in your hand.

The Cards
Available to you are four different card types:

Melee units- Ground troops. They spawn back at base and will follow your orders to move up the battlefield and attack enemy units when within range.

Ranged units - They can be spawned in designated towers around the maps. Can be ordered to shoot at oncoming enemies at a variety of ranges.

Damage Spells - Deal instant damage to enemy units. But be careful not to put your own troops in the line of fire!

Buff Spells - Give your units a little pick-me-up with increased damage and range. These can be used on a selected unit and last a designated amount of turns.
